languages.text: {n}Странный осколок уже был здесь со дня вашего взошествия на трон Вольного Торговца. Чем бы он ни был, понять его происхождение и назначение не представляется возможным.{/n}
{n}The strange shard has been here since at least the day of your ascension to the Rogue Trader's throne. Whatever it is, you cannot possibly guess at its provenance or purpose.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Странный осколок уже был здесь со дня вашего взошествия на трон Вольного Торговца. Чем бы он ни был, понять его происхождение и назначение не представляется возможным.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The strange shard has been here ever since the day of your ascension to the Rogue Trader's throne. It is impossible to ascertain its' origins and purpose.{/n}
{n}The strange shard has been here ever since the day of your ascension to the Rogue Trader's throne. It is impossible to ascertain its' origins and purpose.{/n}
{n}The strange shard has been here since at least the day of your ascension to the Rogue Trader's throne. Whatever it is, you cannot possibly guess at its provenance or purpose.{/n}
{n}The strange shard has been here since at least the day of your ascension to the Rogue Trader's throne. Whatever it is, you cannot possibly guess at its provenance or purpose.{/n}
{n}The strange shard has been here since at least the day of your ascension to the Rogue Trader's throne. Whatever it is, you cannot possibly guess at its provenance or purpose.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这个奇怪的碎片在你继任行商浪人的职位之前就挂在那里了。你无论如何都猜不出来它究竟从何而来，又有何用途。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The strange shard has been here since at least the day of your ascension to the Rogue Trader's throne. Whatever it is, you cannot possibly guess at its provenance or purpose.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个奇怪的碎片在你继任行商浪人的职位之前就挂在那里了。你无论如何都猜不出来它究竟从何而来，又有何用途。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El extraño fragmento lleva aquí por lo menos desde el día en que asumiste el trono como Comerciante Independiente. Sea lo que sea, no tienes ni idea de dónde procede ni cuál fue su propósito.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The strange shard has been here since at least the day of your ascension to the Rogue Trader's throne. Whatever it is, you cannot possibly guess at its provenance or purpose.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El extraño fragmento lleva aquí por lo menos desde el día en que asumiste el trono como Comerciante Independiente. Sea lo que sea, no tienes ni idea de dónde procede ni cuál fue su propósito.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cet étrange fragment était déjà là le jour où vous êtes {mf|devenu le nouveau libre-marchand|devenue la nouvelle libre-marchande}. Vous seriez bien incapable de deviner de quoi il s'agit ou d'où il vient.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The strange shard has been here since at least the day of your ascension to the Rogue Trader's throne. Whatever it is, you cannot possibly guess at its provenance or purpose.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cet étrange fragment était déjà là le jour où vous êtes {mf|devenu le nouveau libre-marchand|devenue la nouvelle libre-marchande}. Vous seriez bien incapable de deviner de quoi il s'agit ou d'où il vient.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der seltsame Splitter hängt hier schon mindestens seit dem Tag deiner Besteigung des Freihändlerthrons. Aber was es auch ist, Sinn und Zweck davon sind dir gänzlich unbekannt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The strange shard has been here since at least the day of your ascension to the Rogue Trader's throne. Whatever it is, you cannot possibly guess at its provenance or purpose.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der seltsame Splitter hängt hier schon mindestens seit dem Tag deiner Besteigung des Freihändlerthrons. Aber was es auch ist, Sinn und Zweck davon sind dir gänzlich unbekannt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}この奇妙な欠片は、少なくともあなたが自由開拓者の王座に就いた日からここにあったものだ。それが何であったとしても、その出所や目的を推測することはできない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The strange shard has been here since at least the day of your ascension to the Rogue Trader's throne. Whatever it is, you cannot possibly guess at its provenance or purpose.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この奇妙な欠片は、少なくともあなたが自由開拓者の王座に就いた日からここにあったものだ。それが何であったとしても、その出所や目的を推測することはできない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bu tuhaf parça, sen Hür Tacir tahtına oturmadan önceden beri orada. Bu şey her neyse kökenini veya amacını tahmin etmen mümkün değil.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The strange shard has been here since at least the day of your ascension to the Rogue Trader's throne. Whatever it is, you cannot possibly guess at its provenance or purpose.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bu tuhaf parça, en azından sen Hür Tacir tahtına oturduğun günden beri orada. Bu şey her neyse, kökenini veya amacını tahmin etmen mümkün değil.{/n}
